articles.title: ASX to rise, Wall Street snaps three-day losing streak - ABC News
articles.description: Australian shares are set to lift after US markets recovered from a three-day losing streak — sparked by signs of economic slowdown in China, Europe's energy crisis and concerns the US Federal Reserve may continue to hike interest rates aggressively.
